events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Your case has been assigned to a customer support agent who will assist you with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 458723 and attached is a photo showing the wrong product I got instead of my original order.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you will receive confirmation within 3 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the immediate refund processing. Thank you for resolving this so fast!
We have completed the refund transaction and sent you a confirmation email. Please check your account in the next few days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything looks perfect now. Thanks again for your help!
We are closing your case as the refund has been successfully processed and acknowledged. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey on your support experience to help us improve our service.
